title: ARTICLE 6:  How the sars-cov-2 sidesteps the evolutionary trade-off.
description: "Nothing in Biology Makes Sense Except in the Light of Evolution" Theodosius Dobzhansky. So as a biologist I tried to understand the progression of the current sars-cov2. And the high contagiousness linked to an high mortality seemed a nonsense in the light of evolution. Thus the following article will explain how this virus is able to sidesteps the evolutionary trade-off.

title: ARTICLE 7:  On the benefits of being infected by a virus.
description: I once heard that the human placenta has a viral origin. Then I’ve been wondering if there were other examples of benefits of being infected by a virus. I found out that a parasitoid wasp takes advantage of an old viral infection. The idea is too see the good side of the pathogens.

title: ARTICLE 5:  Lack of vitamin D linked to weaker immune system
description: The precedent article was about a way to prevent pandemics. But the current situation made me wonder what could strengthen my body in case of an infection. I found out that a supplement of vitamin D was the main solution, especially in Belgium where we don’t have that much sunshine.

title: Article 3 : Self-spreading vaccines as a solution to prevent pandemics ?
description: This is my third article. The first one talked a lot about zoonosis, due to my internet research I heard about a brand new solution which will be resumed in the following article.

title: Arcticle 4 : Permafrost is melting ! Deadly bacteria and virus awake !
description: Here's my fourth post. The first arcticle place the foundment of the link between climat and pandemics. This fourth article will explain how the increase of temperature awake old bacteria and virus.

title: Article 2 : How an inexpensive molecule could help to discover the origin of bacteria virulence ?
description: This post is my second article which will talk about how a molecule will help to discover what makes a bacterium a pathogen and how it can lunch a pandemic.
